      • inTheRepository

        public boolean inTheRepository(MediaFile file)
        Method that verifies if a given file is in the repository.
        Parameters:
        file - File given to check if it is in the repository.
        Returns:
        Boolean variable, true if the given file is in the repository, false otherwise.

      • addMediaFile

        public void addMediaFile(MediaFile newFile)
                  throws edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException
        Add file method. It adds the given media file to the repository, checking if it exists in the disk and if it is already in the repository.
        Parameters:
        newFile - Added MediaFile in the repository.
        Throws:
        edu.ub.prog2.utils.AppException - if the file doesn't exist in the disk or it is already in the repository, the exception is thrown.

      • showRepository

        public java.lang.String showRepository()
        Show repository method. It shows the information of the files in the repository, using a method of the superclass.
        Returns:
        String variable containing the information of all the files.

      • deleteFile

        public void deleteFile(int i)
        Delete file method. It deletes the file in the given position.
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the deleted file in the repository.
